author: captainflo22
post_text: March 27, 2017 at 11:19 PM#1Old stuff but still in action, because the operating manual isn't available yet, because people don't remember or know the process, because...there is 3 macros with the rights values and timings to strike douse or reset the lamp of the Old Martin/ZAP Technology BigLite 4.5kI've make it but not tested, please post your feedback and update of theses if needed.FilesTest macro Big Lite 4.5.xml2.26 kB – 156 Downloads
title: ZAP Technology / Martin BigLite 4.5k Lamp On/Off/Reset Macro
